description: This file provides media diagnostics functions for a React frontend, including checking media endpoint responses and probing video playback capabilities.

methods.name: normalizeBase
methods.description: Normalizes a base URL by removing trailing slash if present.

methods.name: fetchHead
methods.description: Performs a HEAD request to fetch headers of a URL.

methods.name: fetchGet
methods.description: Performs a GET request to fetch content from a URL.

methods.name: runMediaEndpointDiagnostics
methods.description: Runs diagnostics on media endpoints for a given slug, checking video and caption URLs.

methods.name: probeVideoPlayback
methods.description: Probes video playback capability by creating an off-DOM video element and listening for canplay or error events.
